mapper.select: SELECT MPIM.COMPANY_CD , MPIM.DIVISION_CD , MPIM.PROCESS_CD , (SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_PROCESS_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, MPIM.PROCESS_CD ) FROM DUAL) AS PROCESS_NM , MPIM.IO_TYPE , MIC.IO_TYPE_NM , MIC.IL_TYPE , MIL.IL_TYPE_NM , MPIM.SORT_NO , MPIM.USE_YN , MPIM.UPDATE_BY AS UPDATE_USER_NO ,(SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_USER_NAME(MPIM.COMPANY_CD, MPIM.DIVISION_CD, MPIM.UPDATE_BY) FROM DUAL ) AS UPDATE_USER_NM , TO_CHAR(MPIM.UPDATE_DATE ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS UPDATE_DATE , MPIM.DESCRIPTION , ROWIDTOCHAR(MPIM.ROWID) AS KEY_ID FROM MOM_PROCESS_IO_MAPPING MPIM , MOM_IO_CATEGORY MIC , MOM_IL_CATEGORY MIL WHERE MPIM.COMPANY_CD = MIC.COMPANY_CD AND MPIM.DIVISION_CD = MIC.DIVISION_CD AND MPIM.IO_TYPE = MIC.IO_TYPE AND MIC.COMPANY_CD = MIL.COMPANY_CD(+) AND MIC.DIVISION_CD = MIL.DIVISION_CD(+) AND MIC.IL_TYPE = MIL.IL_TYPE(+) AND MPIM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPIM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPIM.PROCESS_CD = #{processType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
